words_with_descriptions.match: A sports contest or game where individuals or teams compete against each other.
words_with_descriptions.curl: A sport in which players slide stones on a sheet of ice towards a target area.
words_with_descriptions.dive: The act of jumping into water head-first, also a technique in football to simulate being fouled.
words_with_descriptions.row: The act of propelling a boat using oars.
words_with_descriptions.swing: The act of moving an object in a curved path, typically used in golf or baseball to hit a ball.
words_with_descriptions.climb: The sport or activity of ascending mountains or cliffs.
words_with_descriptions.sprint: A short, fast race run at full speed over a limited distance.
words_with_descriptions.skate: The action of moving or gliding over a surface, especially ice or a smooth floor, using skates.
words_with_descriptions.dribble: The act of moving a ball by repeatedly tapping it with the hand or foot.
